price: 68. [Lūtas (Lotas)] tarė: „Iš tiesų, jie yra mano svečiai, taigi nedarykite man gėdos.“
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
